alert.note: Alert for Morris (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 2:27PM CST until December 03 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, west winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Morris County. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 9 AM Friday to midnight CST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
